mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Prison of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 22nd of November instant, a negro-man calling himself Henry, and saying he belongs to Mr. William Jacob, residing in the Parish of St. Mary. This boy is black, stout built, speaks French and English --22 years of age--has a scar across his face, which he says was done by a whip. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges, and take him away otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, Nov. 26th 1853.
